1.content: OK, let's get started. First of all, will this be a giantess or shrinking story?
1.title: First of all

choices: She falls down a rabbithole and ends up in Wonderland
She goes into a portal where she's a giant
115.content: Then how about these choices?
115.title: Other

choices: The three fairies (or only one of them)
12.title: Who

125.content: How about Sora from the Kingdom Hearts series?
125.title: Sora

1251.content:
Sora could remember his identity, his powers and his task, but he couldn't remember how he had reached that very strange place. It was some kind of forest, but the trees were all green and very thin... "Oh, no!" Sora said to himself "I'm shrunk! Damn it! What am I gonna do now?!?"
While the Keyblade hero was trying to think, he heard two noises: a female singing voice and very loud footsteps accompanied by the sound of crushing plants. A huge woman was coming!
When the enormous footsteps became very close, Sora saw the woman: she was Briar-Rose! Sora knew about her thanks to Yen Sid, but she looked much more beautiful than shown in the wizard's book.
The beautiful blond girl was carrying a basket and she was wearing her farmer clothes.
The giantess lifted a bare foot right above Sora. The sole was a little dirty, some blades of grass and a squished bug were attacked on it. The foot went down, making a gigantic thud and almost flattening Sora, who managed to jump to his left. "Ironical" he thought "She sings and shows her love for the nature, but meanwhile a whole little world is destroyed under her feet!"
1251.title: The shrinking keyblade hero

choices: Sora tries to hit Aurora's foot
12512.content:
Sora ran away the furthest he could. Meanwhile, the singing barefoot giantess walked away.
The keyblade hero decided to explore the area. After some minutes of walking in that strange forest, Sora saw a group of mushroom edges and cartel with the writing: "Welcome to Mushroom City".
Sora walked into the town. The houses were built in the mushrooms and the inhabitants looked like normal human beings, but they were much smaller. One of them approached the shrunk teenager and said: "Welcome, stranger! Our town is pretty nice, but sometimes a huge giantess comes here and we gotta be very careful. And when she's gone, a lot of our houses are destroyed by her feet. I hate it when it happens! It's so annoying and so scary! I was almost squished once!"
Suddenly, the sweet singing voice and the gigantic footsteps could be heard again... "OH, NO!" the tiny man yelled. A huge shadow covered Mushroom City. Everyone started running around in panic, while Sora just stood where he was: he was so unsettled, he didn't know what to do!
Aurora stepped on a mushroom-house, destroying it. Then she giggled and said: "I love mushrooms!" Sora almost started to hate her...
12512.title: Mushroom City

125121.content: The foot lands in front of Sora and Sora hits it. Aurora feels the hit and looks down. She sees Sora who yells "Leave everyone alone!" A fight is gonna start between the two, who wins? Sora or Aurora?
125121.title: Sora tries to hit Aurora's foot

1251211.content:
Aurora says: "You, little annoying bug, prepare to meet my foot!" She lifts a smooth and enormous bare foot and Sora runs avoiding his death just in time.
Attempting to stomp Sora, Aurora accidentally kills some tiny men and crushes some mushroom-houses. The keyblade hero repeatedly tries to hit the barefoot giantess, but he's too small and he only can annoy her a little without hurting her minimally.
Aurora's gigantic hand suddenly descends on Sora, this time the escape is harder because the giantess is faster and more concentrated. She grabs Sora and holds him between her index finger and her thumb. The hold is so strong that Sora cannot use his weapon.
Aurora exclaims: "What?!? A little man? Why were you bothering me?" Sora answers: "Didn't you notice that you were stomping a city full of innocents?" The blonde giantess looks down and sees a half-destroyed city and some tiny corpses. "Oh, my God! I'm so sorry for them! It's because I like stepping on mushrooms, they're so smooth and so soft... it's not my fault after all, they're so tiny and I'm so huge..." Sora is disgusted: she's much more evil than she seems!
"Anyway" the beautiful giantess continues "I don't forgive who hits me!" "Oh, no..." Sora murmurs...
1251211.title: Aurora wins

12512111.content: How does Aurora decide to torture Sora?
12512111.title: Type of torture

125121112.content: If mouth torture is out what about something else?
125121112.title: Mouth or something else

1251212.content:
"You hit me" says Aurora. Getting mad she begins to stomp the ground and grass. Sora making good use of his tiny size decides to hide in the grass to wait for the opportune moment to strike. Once she sees nothing Aurora stops stomping and says "That should teach that bug a lesson." Then just when she lowers her guard she feels a lot of pain and begins to fall. When she hits the ground she feels something moist and wet. She turns and sees that both her feet have been sliced off and that she's losing a lot of blood. Aurora beginning to slip into unconciousness says "But why?" before closing her eyes and passing away.

Sora climbs on top of a rock and says "Because you hurt a lot of innocent people by crushing their homes."

"Hurray for our hero!"

Sora looks behind him and sees a small group of reamining survivors. Sora says to them "You all gotta leave here, if a another giant comes around it could lead to the problem like before."

"You're right!" says one man from the crowd. Another says "We'll re-build elsewhere." The crowd begins to move out into the distance making Sora say "If they could move at any time why did they waste my time?" Sora sighs and starts walking off into the distance to continue his own journey and hopefully get his normal size back.
1251212.title: Monsters Die

info.brief_description: Aurora from Disney's "Sleeping Beauty" grows huge or shrinks someone
info.description:
I made this interactive story because I think Aurora from "Sleeping Beauty" is one of the hottest and most gorgeous Disney princesses ever!
Take a look at this links:

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_eQ5BBnWj_T8/SY5EASBNdyI/AAAAAAAAHOE/UBAzqBVJWUY/s1600-...

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_eQ5BBnWj_T8/SY5Fb0_bpJI/AAAAAAAAHO8/oAIuUIXd6rs/s1600-...

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/_eQ5BBnWj_T8/SY5E9mJW2RI/AAAAAAAAHOs/udL44gOE2TI/s1600-...

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_eQ5BBnWj_T8/SY5OXuYvesI/AAAAAAAAHRw/PnPknjhwHhI/s1600-...

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/_eQ5BBnWj_T8/SY5OQvhA-uI/AAAAAAAAHRo/8FDm3eKmeAI/s1600-...

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_eQ5BBnWj_T8/SY5J-nG1PqI/AAAAAAAAHP0/oHyXwnO4BD4/s1600-...

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_eQ5BBnWj_T8/SY5GeZokAxI/AAAAAAAAHPU/7KWh7_Q4zDU/s1600-...

IMPORTANT: as you can see in the pictures, this story is set when Aurora lives in the forest as "Briar-Rose" and she goes barefoot all the day!
You can make Aurora grow huge and crush everything underfoot or make someone else shrink and interact with her.

RULES:
No male giants, no gay scenes, no farts, no shit. I prefer feet related scenes, but things like vore, tits, ass etc are also allowed.

Hope you like this, I know it's a pretty unusual macrophile story...
